participant_1.background:
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
My family works to support my dreams.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
i am a karate black belt.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: What's up, what are you interested in?
I'm interested in learning how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
Oh that sounds important, I hope you find a way to manage it.
Thanks, I'm working on it! What are you interested in?
I'm interested in cosplay and reading my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
Oh cool, I've never really been into cosplay but I've heard it can be really fun.
Yeah it can be a lot of fun, especially when you're able to put together a really cool costume.
Yeah I can imagine, it would be cool to be able to transform yourself into someone else for a day.
Yeah it's definitely a lot of fun. What do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm especially into sci-fi and fantasy novels.
Oh cool, I like those too! What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the Harry Potter series, and I also like the Lord of the Rings series.
Oh those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I love how immersive they are.
Yeah they're definitely some of the best fantasy novels ever written.
